attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bromsgrove District Council have decided to close the Bromsgrove Museum with immediate effect.
The 'Norton Collection' was gifted to the people of Bromsgrove by Mr Dennis Norton in 1992. There are approx. 25,000 artefacts mainly with a Bromsgrove connection such as nail making, glass making, salt manufacture, button making, lead casting and the famous Bromsgrove Guild that produced Buckingham Gates and the Liverpool Liver Birds.
